mapper.select: select * from mk_order as o join mk_category_goods as c on o.master_goods_serial=c.category_goods_serial where o.user_id=#{user_id} order by o.order_serial desc

SELECT * FROM mk_category_goods C JOIN mk_goods_detail G on C.category_goods_serial = G.category_goods_serial join mk_order_details O on G.category_goods_serial = O.category_goods_serial where o.order_merchant_serial = #{order_merchant_serial}
SELECT count(*) as listCnt FROM mk_order as o join mk_category_goods as c on o.master_goods_serial=c.category_goods_serial
select sum(order_goods_old_price) as op from mk_order_details where order_merchant_serial=#{order_merchant_serial}
select sum(order_goods_price) as dp from mk_order_details where order_merchant_serial=#{order_merchant_serial}
